title: The Knife
occurrences: Based on a novel "The Knife" by Vuk Draskovic
...for all moslems, after Alah, the knife of Ustashas...
Time has come to sharp the knife,to make bombs and to prepare to be an Ustasha soldier.
How could I betray and deceive my cousins? I swore to knife and bomb that I'll go all the way...
You must have an operation. -What operation? They won't stick a knife into Rabiah's eyes.
